channel.title: Cloud Computing on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Computing on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog

item.title: Beyond virtualization
item.description: I guess it’s time to sum up recent trends in how we build, deploy, and operate complex server side software. Virtualization and cloud computing have been with us for quite a while but right now the era of containers is coming, with entire Docker ecosystem paving the way. You might want to ask a very valid question: “What’s in it for me?” :) I will focus on business implications of the technology.
